text: Need Hayden Howard for Officeworks campaign. Budget around $3,694, looking for 3 x LinkedIn post, 2 x Instagram story, 3 x Instagram post, 1 x Lifestyle photography, 2 x Instagram story. 6 week exclusivity from other electronics brands. Campaign runs January 2026. Usage rights for 7 months. Engagement period: 6 months. Need to confirm: exclusivity period
